EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_QCon NYC_Q118.Post Event Email QCON NYC
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at QCON NYC 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for joining Pivotal and the Spring community at QCon New York. We hope you enjoyed learning how enterprises are adopting cloud-native application architectures to drive modern, software experiences for their customers. If you’d like to talk to us about arranging a hands on workshop day in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-qcon-nyc-q118]]> to begin a discussion.
Need some dev/test or CI environments? Try running Spring Boot on our public Cloud Foundry instance, Pivotal Web Services <[[http://run.pivotal.io/spring?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-qcon-nyc-q118]]>, a platform engineered for Spring Boot.
In the meantime, start your Cloud-Native Journey <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-qcon-nyc-q118]]> and learn about underlying concepts <[[https://pivotal.io/topics?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-qcon-nyc-q118]]>, why it matters, what it looks like and how to become cloud-native. Download and read free chapters of Cloud-Native Java <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/cloud-native-java-ebook?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-qcon-nyc-q118]]>, by Josh Long and Kenny Bastani.
In case you missed anything, here’s a quick recap:
- Developer To Architect <[[https://qconnewyork.com/ny2018/workshop/developer-architect]]>, Nate Schutta - Practical Microservice, Full Day Build <[[https://qconnewyork.com/ny2018/workshop/practical-microservice-full-day-build]]>, Adib Saikali, Neven Cvetkovic & Andrew Stakhov - Spring AMA <[[https://qconnewyork.com/ask-me-anything]]> with Rossen Stoyanchev and Adib Saikali
Click here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/qcon-new-york?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-qcon-nyc-q118]]> for the latest in Spring, Pivotal and Cloud Foundry.
Stay in touch with the Spring Team and join the conversation on our blogs <[[http://spring.io/blog?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-qcon-nyc-q118]]>, podcasts <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-qcon-nyc-q118]]>, and on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/PivotalDACH]]>. We hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-qcon-nyc-q118]]>!
Thanks, Pivotal and The Spring Team
